sections.content: # CV
### **GIRTEKA – Head of Corporate Communications (2022 - ended 06.2025)**

Building, developing, and managing corporate communications, with a focus on positioning, sustainability, digitalization, crisis communication, media relations, and digital presence including social media.
**Responsibilities:**

- Development and execution of communication and brand positioning strategy for Girteka Group
- Preparation of public relations and CSR strategy
- Implementing crisis management policy
- Cooperation and support for the internal communication team
- United Nations Global Compact reporting
- Integrating sustainable policy into Communication
- Establishing brand awareness in the digital landscape
- Content creation and utilization (internally and externally)
- Leading media communication strategies and projects
- Cooperation with business units to support long-term strategies and brand perception, with lead generation processes
- Redefining internal communication processes
- Managing social media strategy and execution
- Analyzing, evaluating, and improving existing activities based on defined KPIs and company goals
- Representing the company in media
- Establishing company position and relations with key stakeholders, including NGOs, local communities, authorities, industry organizations, partners
- Planning and realization of marketing budget spend
- Initiating and realization of new cross-business unit digital projects
**Main achievements:**

- Increased social media reach and engagement by 300%
- Executed video campaign with a reach of 2 million views
- Increased Girteka presence in media up to 1.8k mentions
- Established a position among NGOs and logistics associations in Poland
- Achieved 5th place in online reputation research in Lithuania
- Managed crises related to drivers’ working conditions
- Implemented AI solutions in operational Group’s MarCom Team
- Launched dedicated drivers’ and Group’s website
### **ROCKWOOL Polska Sp. z o.o. – Marketing Communication & PR Department Manager CEE (2018–2022)**
Managing communication department, with brand strategy preparation and implementation across CEE, with strong engagement in digital, sales, and customer-related areas.
**Responsibilities:**

- Development and execution of communication and brand positioning strategy for CEE markets
- Preparation of public relations and CSR strategy, including crisis management
- Preparation and coordination of public affairs activities, including regulatory affairs and social campaigns
- Securing growth of brand recognition and preferences in local markets
- Content creation and utilization (internally and externally)
- Leading all media communication strategies and projects
- Managing the company’s external communication
- Managing social media strategy and execution, including discussion groups
- Analyzing, evaluating, and improving existing activities based on KPIs and long/short-term goals
- Representing the company in media
- Establishing relationships with key stakeholders, including NGOs, local communities, authorities, and industry organizations
- Planning and realization of marketing budget spend
- Initiating and realizing new cross-functional digital projects
- Managing international remote team
**Main achievements:**

- Maintained brand attention in media (up to 2k mentions)
- Continuous sales growth (up to 10% YoY)
- Reduced number of local crises and claims by 60%
- Won Golden Arrow award for B2B loyalty programs
- Improved team efficiency by 10% through structural and process changes
- Implemented MS Teams and project workflows
### **ROCKWOOL – Marketing Communication & PR Manager (2015–2018)**
Managing the communication department in Poland, preparing and implementing the brand and marketing strategy, including full digital activities and PR/PA.
**Responsibilities:**

- Development and execution of communication and brand positioning strategy for Polish market
- Preparation of public relations and CSR strategy, including crisis management
- Cooperation with public affairs officers
- Development of social campaigns
- Growth of brand recognition and preferences in Poland
- Development of video strategy
- Leading media communication strategies and projects
- Managing external communication and social media
- Representing company in media and communication with stakeholders
- Establishing relations with NGOs, local communities, authorities, and industry organizations
- Planning and realization of marketing budget spend
**Main achievements:**

- Increased brand recognition by 17% and brand preference by 15%
- Continuous sales growth (up to 6% YoY)
- Implemented marketing automation solutions
### **ROCKWOOL – PR & CSR Manager (2011–2015)**
Managing PR and CSR activities, including media coverage, local community and authority relations, and corporate PR.
**Responsibilities:**

- Development and execution of communication and brand positioning strategy
- Preparation of CSR and crisis communication strategy
- Cooperation with public affairs officers
- Conducted campaigns in fire safety and energy efficiency
- Cooperation with NGOs and sector organizations
**Main achievements:**

- Established fire safety NGO ([stowarzyszenienizo.org](http://www.stowarzyszenienizo.org/))
- Achieved media coverage worth up to 6M PLN/year in the building sector
### **BuildDesk Polska Sp. z o.o. – Marketing Manager (2008–2011)**
Introduced and coordinated new company on the Polish market. Specialized in energy audits and energy performance certification tools and consulting.

- Implemented SaaS solutions for energy certification
- Planned and executed brand positioning, marketing, and communication strategy
